basics.name: John Doe
basics.summary: Experienced IT professional with over 20 years in software development, managerial roles, and mentoring. Skilled in client-facing roles, remote team coordination, and diverse industry sectors including enterprise software and cloud computing. Proven leadership in mentoring, managing technical projects, and strategic planning with a strong focus on clean code and agile practices. Experience in presales, functional analysis, and consulting on CRM, Microsoft Dynamics, cloud applications, and data migrations.
